docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver Broncos cornerback Chris Harris Jr is out for the rest of the playoffs with a torn anterior cruciate ligament in his left knee; other news noted.

docs.abstract: Cristiano Ronaldo, star forward for Portugal and Real Madrid, breaks down in tears after being named FIFA’s world player of the year.

docs.snippet: The Meadowlands Tailgate Party 2014 and the Secaucus Winter Blast will accommodate people who cannot get tickets to the game....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Meadowlands Tailgate Party 2014 and the Secaucus Winter Blast will accommodate people who cannot get tickets to the game.
docs.abstract: Meadowlands Tailgate Party 2014 and the Secaucus Winter Blast on Super Bowl Sunday will let East Rutherford and Secaucus, the two towns closest to the kickoff, capitalize on the game, and will accommodate people who cannot get tickets (Series: Super Bowl XLVIII).

headline.main: No-Tailgating Rule Spurs Events, but None Dare Call Them Super Bowl Parties

docs.lead_paragraph: A $760 million settlement between the National Football League and thousands of former players, who contend the league downplayed the risk of concussions, was rejected on Tuesday by a U.S. judge who said it might not be enough to pay all of the affected players.

docs.snippet: WHAT HAPPENED: Lawyers for more than 4,500 former players and the NFL have agreed to settle the lawsuit brought by the players for concussion-linked injuries they suffered while playing. Settlements must be approved by a judge to ensure they are f...
docs.lead_paragraph: WHAT HAPPENED: Lawyers for more than 4,500 former players and the NFL have agreed to settle the lawsuit brought by the players for concussion-linked injuries they suffered while playing. Settlements must be approved by a judge to ensure they are fair to both parties. In this case, Judge Anita B. Brody said she wants more financial data before giving preliminary approval to the agreement.

headline.main: NFL Concussion Lawsuit At a Glance
headline.print_headline: NFL Concussion Lawsuit At a Glance
